alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:52PM CDT until August 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TUSCALOOSA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 352 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Splash Adventure to near Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Birmingham, Hoover, Bessemer, Hueytown, Lipscomb, Lake View, North Johns, Splash Adventure, Abernant, Patton Creek, Ross Bridge, Bluff Park, Riverchase Galleria, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, McCalla, Promenade Tannehill, Bucksville, Weller, Shannon and Bent Brook Golf Club. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
